bibl.note: According to Will Hansen, Assistant Curator of Collections at Duke University Library, the manuscript albums and transcripts were prepared by a previous owner in the early twentieth century.

revisionDesc.change: replaced "unclear" encoding with "supplied" where appropriate and updated sourceDesc
Replace internal notes with external notes
Silent Proofreading Correctios and Miller date note
Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent Proof
revised header to move WWA staff names to respStmt; removed empty opener child elements; replaced wwa editorial notes with ptrs to external notes file.
Narrowed date to March 9-14, 1863 and corrected Bucke annotation. Added annotation for George Washington Whitman and Fort Monroe.
Clean encoding (editor, date, remove "_large") and add standard annotations on unannotated files (Jeff W, Martha [Mattie], George W, Lou Haslam)

body.p:
George is so engaged i told him i would write A few lines to you he wants you to send those flannel shirts here by express he thought he could get them better from here than to send them to fortress monroe i suppose Jeffy letter announced the news of his arrival he come at last quite unexpected although i had looked for him every day for A week but began to think he would not come he came about 11 Oclock o'clock came in with his key and came in the
basement and could not get in I have been in the habit since you went away of locking the basement door so he went up stairs and went to bed and said nothing got up in the morning and was busy fixing the fire in my new stove as he opened the door i says Edd get your thick boots without looking around you may depend i was so glad to see him i did not know how to get breakfast so we took it upstairs and had buckwheat cakes the folks doo do as if they would eat him up he has invitation from all quarters i told him
to day i hoped he would get through his visits he aint ain't home much this morning porter came to see him to night he has gone to hear miss heron)

how are you walt i hope you have got better of that feeling in your head verhaps the wax in your ears is got hard that will sometimes cause a deafness a very little sweet oil would releive relieve it if its caused by that write doo how you are i hope you wont won't get sick i feel quite well since i have got better of my cold I have had a letter from Heyd and hanna
wrote part of it she was rather better but it hurt her to lean over to write heyde said she was much better off there than she would be here on account of having a fire i suppose on the same frour she wrote quite cheerful said the doctor said he wondered she dident didn't get better faster she said she should not always be sick the least sudden moove move hurts her so i suppose it would be almost impossible for her to come at present i am in hopes when the weather comes warm she will get better we expect mary down to morrow or next day Marthe is pretty well and sis goes the whole figure she takes to her uncle George very much
i went up and told then George had come they was not up she told her mother to get up quick and dress and take her down to see uncle george wounded in the cheek Andrew was here twice to see Georg and has not seen him yet he is gone out nearly all the time he finds many friends in brooklyn Brooklyn he has got his things mostly ready made Jeff went with him to new york New York they are very nice looking but very high price his pants 10 d his coat 22 his cap 4 1/2 his shoulder strap 6d his one shirt woolen 3 dollar all these figures is doller you must know and then he got drawers
and some other things he had 100 and 25 dollar in the bank and he took out 100 and thought it would be enoughf enough but it is not i told him to draw it all out but he said he could borrow some several of the regiment has sent for things by him he thought he could get his pay but porter told him to day there was no funds here so i told him to get that 25 from the bank i would make out i can get things from Amerman and that you sent me change enoughf we have got all your letter walt and Jeff will send the pictures i have got all the change got some yesterday it comes very good whenever you can spare it
